questions.question_text: Nirvikalp uttam ati, _____ tav Ghanshyām; Māhātmya-gnān-yukt bhakti tav, _____ sukh ḍhām.
questions.explanation: The kirtan by Premanand Swami states 'Nirvikalp uttam ati, nischay tav Ghanshyām; Māhātmya-gnān-yukt bhakti tav, ekāntik sukh ḍhām.'

questions.question_text: Mohime tav bhaktapano, tāme koī prakār; Dosh na rahe koī jātko, suniyo Dharmakumār.
questions.explanation: This verse is the second verse of the kirtan by Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: Tumāro tav Hari bhaktako, droh kabu nahi hoy; _____ tav dāsko, dīje samāgam moy.
questions.explanation: The kirtan by Premanand Swami states 'Tumāro tav Hari bhaktako, droh kabu nahi hoy; kāntik tav dāsko, dīje samāgam moy.'

questions.question_text: Nāth nīrantar darsh tav, tav dāsanko dās; Ehī māgu karī vinay Hari, sadā rākhiyo pās.
questions.explanation: This verse is the fourth verse of the kirtan by Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: He Krupālo! He Bhaktapte! _____; Dayāsindho! stavan karī, māgu vastu sāt.
questions.explanation: The kirtan by Premanand Swami states 'He Krupālo! He Bhaktapte! Bhaktavatsal! suno bāt; Dayāsindho! stavan karī, māgu vastu sāt.'

questions.question_text: Sahajānand Mahārājke, sab satsangī sujāṇ; Tāku hoy dradh vartano, Shikshāpatrī pramāṇ.
questions.explanation: This verse is the sixth verse of the kirtan by Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: So Patrī me atibaḍe, niyam _____; Tākī vigti kahat hu, suniyo sab chitt proy.
questions.explanation: The kirtan by Premanand Swami states 'So Patrī me atibaḍe, niyam ekādash joy; Tākī vigti kahat hu, suniyo sab chitt proy.'

questions.question_text: Hinsā na karnī jantukī, partriyā sangko tyāg; Māns na khāvat madhyaku, pīvat nahi badbhāg.
questions.explanation: This verse is the eighth verse of the kirtan by Premanand Swami.

questions.question_text: Vidhvāku sparshat nahi, karat na _____; Chori na karnī kāhukī, kalank na kouku lagāt.
questions.explanation: The kirtan by Premanand Swami states 'Vidhvāku sparshat nahi, karat na ātmaghat; Chori na karnī kāhukī, kalank na kouku lagāt.'

questions.question_text: Ehī (vidhi) dharmake niyamme, barto sab haridās; Bhajo Shrī Sahajānandpad, chhoḍi aur sab ās.
questions.explanation: This verse is the eleventh verse of the kirtan by Premanand Swami.
